text:
$6 shrimp fried rice -- literally rice, egg & shrimp (look at size of shrimp vs spoon comparison). A small bite of the rice was still cold.

On the bright side, the boss was nice and friendly and offered to make recommendations. And they came over to take our orders.

Wide variety of food on the menu though.
Brastagi cafe near kampong Omar mosque.. Chinese halal food and drink. Happy to have  food nearby mosque.

This is one of the best Chinese Halal in town with a lot of varieties of foods to choose from.
They also some good Thai and Indonesian Ayam Penyet. Prices are reasonable with time waiting of some 10 to 15 mins. during lunch crowd. I never fail to eat the same food everyday. Have a try and you will fall in love with it.

We used to live nearby this place and many times we get our food here. Auntie and uncle are very nice. And even we already moved from other place, we still come here for some time. The food is still the same and is always good. ðŸ˜Š
The food were not as good be it its taste or presentation. The uncle was so stuck up even he owns the place!!!!!
